title: Regulator Says Master Deals Left BRB With $1 Billion Hole
description: A Brazilian state-owned bank is coming under increased scrutiny as regulators estimate transactions tied to failed Banco Master SA left a nearly $1 billion gap in its finances.
content: A Brazilian state-owned bank is coming under increased scrutiny as regulators estimate transactions tied to failed Banco Master SA left a nearly $1 billion gap in its finances.
